title: Microneedles as an emerging platform for skin cancer treatment

abstract: Skin cancer/carcinoma is a highly perilous form of cancer and ranks as the fifth most frequently documented cancer globally, as reported by the World Health Organization (1). Several established factors contributing to the risk of skin cancer …

title: Investigation on the influence of the skin tone on hyperspectral imaging for free flap surgery

abstract: Hyperspectral imaging (HSI) is a new emerging modality useful for the noncontact assessment of free flap perfusion. This measurement technique relies on the optical properties within the tissue. Since the optical properties of hemoglobin (Hb) and …
